NUMBER 1

Gilmor Street - Sharp Street Trackless Trolley Line

ROUTE: Druid Hill and Fulton Avenue, Fulton
Ave., Lanvale St., Gilmor St., Baltimore St., Sharp
St., West St., Leadenhall St., Ostend St., to Sharp
and Ostend Sts. Returning, Sharp St., Lee St., Han-
over St., Baltimore St., Gilmor St., then over same
route to Fulton and Druid Hill Avenues.

NUMBER 2

Carey Street - Fort Avenue Trackless Trolley Line

ROUTE: Druid Hill and Fulton Aves., Druid Hill
Ave., Retreat St., Pennsylvania Ave., Cumberland
St., Carey St., Mosher St., Carrollton Ave., Balti-
more St., Charles St., Fort Ave., to Fort McHenry.
Returning: Fort Ave., Charles St., L.ee St., Hanover
St., Baltimore St., Carey St., Cumberland St., Penn-
sylvania Ave., Fulton Ave. to Fulton and Druid Hill
Aves. Terminus.

All-night buses operate between Fort McHenry
and Belvedere Loop.

NUMBER 3
Northwood Bus Line

ROUTE: Loch Raven Blvd. and Walker Ave. via
Loch Raven Blvd., Alameda, 33rd St., St. Paul St.,
Eager St., Cathedral St., Liberty St., Park Ave.,
Hopkins Place, Redwood St., Charles St. to Balti-
more St. Returning via Charles St., 33rd St., Ala-
meda, Loch Raven Blvd. to Walker Ave. Buses also
operate to Baynesville via Loch Raven Blvd.

Line

ROUTE: Glyndon Terminus via Waugh Ave., But-

vania Ave., Greene St., Baltimore St., Light St., to
Redwood St. Returning via Redwood St., Paca St.,

to Glyndon and Emory Grove. Number 7 Line, Pikes-

NUMBER 6

Curtis Bay - Fairfield - Monument Street - Armistead
Gardens Bus Line

ROUTE: Curtis Bay Terminus via Pennington
Ave., Patapsco Ave., Hanover St., Barney St., Light
St., Calvert St., Pleasant St., Hillen St., Monument
St., Pulaski Highway, Armistead Way, Harper Way,
Wright Ave., Orville Rd., Federal St., Freedomway,

St., Holliday St., Baltimore St., Light St., Hill St.,

branch) via Patapsco Ave., Fairfield Rd., Chesapeake

Ave., New Shell Rd., Patapsco Ave. to Pennington
Ave., then over same route. Buses also operate to
Davison Chemical Company and U.S. Coast Guard
Station from Curtis Bay via Pennington Ave.

Roland Park and Highlandtown Trackless Trolley Line
